topic.title: NHS Continuing Healthcare Fast Track Pathway Tool
topic.shortdesc: A NHS Continuing Healthcare Fast Track Pathway Tool is used when a CARE PROFESSIONAL considers that a PERSON should be fast tracked for NHS Continuing Healthcare because that PERSON has a rapidly deteriorating condition and the condition may be entering a terminal phase.
